class.title: Programming Logic
class.description: This course provide a foundation for good problem-solving skills focused on web application programming.

class.title: New Web Technology
class.description: This course targets introducting new technologies and trends in the web development area.

class.title: php2
class.description: This course builds on the material covered in PHP, with emphasis on programming concepts for web applications.

class.title: jQuery and AJAX
class.description: This course builds on the introduction to jQuery and AJAX technologies.

class.title: Project Management 3
class.description: This course give students an advanced understanding of the tools and technologies necessary for project management.

class.title: Interface Planning and Design
class.description: This course focused on students implementing web design concepts and graphic skills.

class.title: Advanced Typography
class.description: This course surveys the development of typographic design from its origin to current trends in digital typography, specifically for use on the web.

class.title: Introduction to Wordpress
class.description: This course give students a basic understanding of the Wordpress system and how to create websites with it.

class.title: UX Design
class.description: This course introduces the students to user experience design, usability design, and interaction design.
